text: Leandro Despouy (April 4, 1947 - December 18, 2019) was an Argentine human rights lawyer and politician. He was born in San Luis, Argentina. He was the United Nations Commission on Human Right's Special Rapporteur on the Independence of Judges and Lawyers from August 2003 until July 2009. From 2002 through 2016, he was the General Auditor of Argentina. Despouy died of cancer in Buenos Aires on December 18, 2019 at the age of 72.Leandro Despouy, a fighter for transparency and human rights, died ==References== ==Other websites== * UN Cites Torture Reports At Gitmo , CBS News, June 23, 2005 Category:1947 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Argentina Category:Argentine politicians Category:Argentine human rights activists
title: Leandro Despouy
